task.title: Using a network license on a client computer

taskbody.context: Once the network license is activated on the license server, it can be used on client computers.

choices.choice: If you start for the first time, click the Activate License button in the BricsCAD Launcher dialog box.
If you replace or upgrade an existing license, launch the , click Manage License and click Modify.

step.cmd: Check the Network License option in the Activate BricsCAD dialog box.
Type the host name or IP address of the license server in the Server name or address field.
(optional) Type the port number in the Port Number field.
If your computer is connected to the license server through a proxy server, click the Proxy Settings button to configure the proxy settings for a network license.
